attributes.action: introduce a bill into the House to subject members of both chambers to random drink and drug testing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the public more and more persons are being subjected to random drink and drug testing.
Be this through occupational, or recreational schemes, many mandatory in the work place.
As the Houses of Parliament could be deemed to be a place of employment. So should it's members, in the interests of health, safety, and public knowledge, be subject to random testing.
Said testing to be on a random sample of members present at any one sitting. But to be set up so that all members are tested at least once in a year.
Testing to be carried out by an independent body, over seen by the offices of Black Rod.
Limits for alcohol shall be set at the same limits as apply to motorists. Whilst any traces of classified substances(drugs) shall be a notifiable incident.
Results to be published quarterly in Hansard.
